question: Recently, the Ministry of Tribal Affairs announced to launch the country’s first ever “Van Dhan Vikas Kendra” in which of the following states?
explanation: The Ministry of Tribal affairs has recently approved the establishment of the country’s first multipurpose “Van Dhan Vikas Kendra” on pilot basis for establishment in Bijapur District of Chhattisgarh State. It aims at providing skill upgradation and capacity building training and setting up of primary processing and value addition facility for the tribal people. This first model Van Dhan Vikas Kendra is being implemented for training of 300 beneficiaries with a total outlay of Rs 43.38 lakhs for training, providing equipments & tools for primary level processing and infrastructure & building for housing the Kendra. This Kendra to start with will have processing facility for Tamarind brick making, Mahua flower storage facility and chironjee cleaning and packaging. TRIFED has been assigned the work for establishment of this pilot Vikas Kendra. The selection of the tribal beneficiaries and formation of the SHGs has been undertaken by TRIFED and the training is scheduled to start from 10th April 2018.
